column6:
The divorce is final, and now come the bitter recriminations. But where DEADPOOL is concerned, that means dredging up the ghosts of every person he's ever KILLED -- and trying to understand WHY he did it and how he FELT about it -- that's right, Wade must confront his MANLY FEELINGS of MAYHEM! The agony might very well prove too much... but what does Deadpool do if the only person capable of getting these ghosts out of his head is the person responsible for putting them there...?,2006,12
32 PGS./Rated T+ ...$2.99
column8: | penciller (cover):Mark Brooks | penciller:Reilly Brown | inker:Jeremy Freeman | colorist:Gotham Entertainment Group | writer:Fabian Nicieza | letterer:Dave Sharpe
